document.full_text: the most prominent libyan defector said on monday his country could become "a new somalia" unless all sides involved in the conflict stopped it from descending into civil war.
document.title: koussa says libya could become "new somalia": bbc
lines_and_colors: the most prominent libyan defector said on monday his country could become "a new somalia" unless all sides involved in the conflict stopped it from descending into civil war.
